attributes.content: GreyThroat! What's your position?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, I am providing support to an L. G. D. team.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: We're about to engage!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Attention all elite operators: this may be our first, last, and only large-scale battle in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Everyone take objective one as your primary mission.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: My team and I will be focusing on engaging the enemy commander.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I want you all to remember: top priority is completing the terms of our contract, that is to work with the L. G. D. to ensure the security of Lungmen.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But Rhodes Island's mission in this battle is to reduce the friction between the Infected and uninfected people, to prevent clashes!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We are Rhodes Island! No matter what else we carry into battle!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No matter when, no matter where!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And of course, if at any point our operations fall outside our standards, we will put a stop to them at once!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: As such, we go into battle with a heavy burden of responsibility on our shoulders.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That was for my sake, huh?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: She's such a worrywart...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.options: We'd better speed up, or we won't make it.

attributes.content: You saw what tough customers those Infected were back there. That's a lot for one operator, or even one team to handle.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I really should've put that kid to bed once and for all back on the rooftop.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Oh, copy.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: If you don't get your butt to the ambush point, I'll take all of last year's disciplinary reports and hand them over to Dr. Kal'tsit!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Settle down! I'll be there right on time!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.options: Amiya! She's scratching my coat!;......;Could you put me down when you take a call?

attributes.content: Blaze!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What am I supposed to do? We have to hurry...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: (You'll pay for that one!)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Why so quiet, Doctor?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ......Blaze!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I didn't do anything! It's the Doctor who clammed up!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Tell her already!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Come on, say something...!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Huh...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Sorry, Doctor. I forgot you and Blaze would definitely go at it like this...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I do what I gotta do.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Why are you so pleased with yourself?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Anyway, all I need is your location and current operation.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You two seem to be getting along.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Sure are!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...Really?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Wait, what's happening here? What should I tell her?)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: (This is bad! Red alert! I'm taking psychic damage! I need guidance!)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Keep at it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She hung up!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Oh no. We're in trouble.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But at least we're here. Let's take a load off.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.options: But this is the highest point in the district?

attributes.content: Well... shit.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You know what they say, the shortest distance between two points is a straight line. Let's hop down.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Yep. Yawn.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hold on... If I'm not mistaken... That's Mephisto's team over there to the east, moving to the ambush zone.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: And over there... the scaly kid?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: He's taking his team to fight something. What is all that black there?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Is that the herd...? With those numbers?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Looks like we can't rest here, Doctor. Let's go. Time for the final battle!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hey, Amiya. Hey!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'm taking the Doctor into the fight!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What are you thinking?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: We let a small Reunion group go, then we track them into the slums.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Weren't you leaving that to the special forces?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: No reason we can't take the opportunity.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I've already looked into the situation once and one thing is clear: as long as we're there, the special forces can't act openly.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Once the fighting stops, they won't be able to do much.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You're not worried about orders from the top?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Who's going to stand up and take responsibility for the team?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: All right, so you've got it all figured out. What's going on in the slums?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: My informants have been busy. There's a few sectors I haven't been able to contact, but we have a lot more intelligence than anyone else.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: This is a big gamble. But I guess we have no choice.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: The L. G. D. is the only group that can face down the special forces.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Amiya, do you copy?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Officer Ch'en, we're in position!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Mmhm.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I need to apologize for the whole ordeal with Reunion scooping up the Infected. That wouldn't have happened if we'd been more thoughtful.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...It's thanks to the L. G. D.'s quick action in the slums that Lungmen is able to plan against Reunion.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: On a strategic level, I think you're fine, Officer Ch'en. But personally...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Officer Ch'en, Misha is dead.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And I can't condone your opinions of the Infected. Even you know...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The Lungmenites who love their city will fight for her, no matter who they are.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Wow, what an awesome little bunny.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Did I just hear Miss Swire?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't mind her.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hey!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I agree with you, Amiya. Fighting for Lungmen can unite the people... except those tied up with Reunion.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But actually living in Lungmen is another matter. Time can't solve everything.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Of course. We have to solve everything ourselves.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Wishful thinking. The Infected and uninfected live in different worlds.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It's not wishful thinking, Officer Ch'en. It's thinking about Misha, and the countless other Infected who died just like her.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It was the gap between those two worlds that killed them. Are we going to let that divide define us? Are we not going to fight to bridge it?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I hope you can understand, Officer Ch'en, why it is that the Infected and uninfected of Rhodes Island come together to fight for Lungmen.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They're here, Officer Ch'en.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Prepare for battle.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It's an ambush! The L. G. D. is pushing us in!
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Push through to the slums. Even though we haven't heard from Crownslayer... the slums are our only way out.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Take him.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: What are you going to do?
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Me and a few teams have encouraged the 'herd' to gather up here.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: They won't attack me, so I can fight alongside them.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Fire in the hole!
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: We can't hold for long!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Ugh... Guhhh!!
attributes.name: Herd

attributes.content: It's those special Infected! Look out!
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: You'll bring up the rear?
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: You're not coming back.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Mmm! Mmhhh!!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Let him speak. He can't do his Arts like this.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: What are you doing?!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Mephisto...
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: What are you doing?! You can't do this! Come back! Please! Come back here!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: You once told me you would do anything I asked you.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Sasha!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: You said you don't want to make decisions for yourself.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: It's just, if you have your own ideas and your own goals now... I can't blame you for your choices.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: If that's the way it is, Mephisto... Well, that's great.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: I'm out of options.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: So let me tell you my last wish.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Sasha...? What are you talking about? I don't understand!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Don't let them escape! Take out their commanders!
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: ...The Rhodes Island swallow?
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: (Mouthing 'pull the trigger.')
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Hit the deck! Watch the crossfire! We've got them surrounded!
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: Fall back, Rhodes Island crossbowman! This corridor is ours!
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: Faust! Run!
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Crossbowmen, I know FrostNova is on her way. And even though Crownslayer is missing, her people are out there in the slums somewhere.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: When FrostNova gets here, you're under her command.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: I trust her. Once she arrives, you'll be okay.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: And with my Originium Arts, you'll be invisible.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: You can't, Faust! That will rupture your organs!
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Doesn't matter. There's no reason not to do it anymore.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Retreat. That's an order.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: And take him with you. But not to Chernobog.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: ...Faust...
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: You can't do this!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: I hope you survive. Even on your own.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Don't die.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: ——That's my last wish.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Sasha! Sashaaaaa!!!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: I don't want to hurt anyone. I don't want to get anyone hurt.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: I wish we had just run away, back then.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: We could have... just run away.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Sasha, you promised! We promised each other! We swore we would survive together!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: It's too late... for me...
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: ...I'm too tired.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: Sashaaaaaa!!!
attributes.name: Mephisto

attributes.content: Goodbye, Eno.
attributes.name: Faust

attributes.content: He nocks a bolt into his crossbow, and winds it.
He takes aim, for the last time.
